pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Gong1 ren2 Ti3 yu4 chang3
Ku4 er3 de2 Gong1 ren2 dang3

sentences.english: Once (he was)a worker , Pang Long now becomes a famous singer.
sentences.chinese: 庞龙曾经是个工人，现在变成一位著名的歌手。

sentences.english: Workers weave silk thread into beautiful shirts.
sentences.chinese: 工人把丝线织成漂亮的衬衫。

sentences.english: But why these workingman 's clothes?What was the meaning of this?
sentences.chinese: 但是为什么穿这身工人服呢？

sentences.english: In the end, the workers became used to doing hard work.
sentences.chinese: 最后，工人们终于习惯于干苦活了。

sentences.english: The workers phased the various processes in shirt production.
sentences.chinese: 工人们安排好衬衣生产的各道工序。

sentences.english: The workers laid about them to increase production.
sentences.chinese: 工人们竭尽全力增加生产。

sentences.english: Voluntary workers built a road to the boy's camp.
sentences.chinese: 自愿的工人建了一条路，通到男孩子们的营地。

sentences.english: Union was a tool used by the capitalists in their vain attempt to damp down the labour movement.
sentences.chinese: 那个黄色工会是资本家妄图用来扑灭工人运动的工具。

sentences.english: The social worker had to deal with the poor family's mistrust of strangers.
sentences.chinese: 该社工人员必须应付这户穷苦人家对陌生人的不信任。

sentences.english: The government will look into the working conditions of the workers.
sentences.chinese: 政府将对工人们的工作条件进行调查研究。

sentences.english: The workers torn down the old house and built a new one in its place.
sentences.chinese: 工人们拆毁旧屋，并在原址上另盖新屋。

sentences.english: Since the bosses can't do without profit workers have an dege.
sentences.chinese: 由于老板不能没有利润，工人们就占了上风。

sentences.english: Daqiang is the most skillful of all the workers here.
sentences.chinese: 大强是这里所有的工人当中最熟练的。

sentences.english: Hammer and sickle symbols of the industrial worker and the peasant are used as the emblem of the ussr .
sentences.chinese: 代表产业工人和农民的锤子镰刀图案用作前苏联国徽。

sentences.english: A skilled worker who and engraves precious stones .
sentences.chinese: 一个和雕刻珍贵宝石的工人。

sentences.english: This complex emits low pollution levels and employs many workers.
sentences.chinese: 联合企业释放低污染并且雇用很多工人。

definition: working woman/variant of 女紅|女红[nu:3 gong1]
migrant worker/temporary worker enlisted on a public project
